participant_1.name: Lila Thompson
participant_1.personality: Creative, passionate about cooking, and enjoys living in the moment.
participant_1.background: I listen to music that makes me forget about my troubles and live in the moment. My motor never stops running. I am proud of my ability to cook a variety of cuisines and my willingness to treat everyone with respect. I love the rain. I do not own a home because I would rather spend my money on Mountain Dew and pastries.

participant_2.name: Jake Robinson
participant_2.personality: Family-oriented, hardworking, and values performance over appearance.
participant_2.background: I play with my dogs to help me feel younger. I'm not rich, but I'm working hard to provide for my family. My appearance is not as important to me as my performance. I would like to spend more time with my family, but I have been very busy with my show. I have four cats.

content.text: I like to listen to music that makes me forget about my troubles and live in the moment.
I play with my dogs to help me feel younger.
I am proud of my ability to cook a variety of cuisines and my willingness to treat everyone with respect.
I'm not rich, but I'm working hard to provide for my family.
I would like to spend more time with my family, but I have been very busy with my show.
My appearance is not as important to me as my performance.
I do not own a home because I would rather spend my money on Mountain Dew and pastries.
Well, you seem like an interesting person. What do you do for a living?
I am a cook and I love my job. I get to be creative and I get to meet all sorts of interesting people.
That sounds like a great job! I am a performer and I love my job as well. I get to be creative and I get to entertain people.
That sounds like a lot of fun! What kind of performer are you?
I am a singer and I play the guitar.
That's awesome! I love live music. I always enjoy going to concerts.
Me too! I love the energy of a live show.
I'm glad we have something in common
